text: @realDonaldTrump @POTUS And I will not forget or overlook all the "pork" Pelosi and her rats forced into the COVID-19 package as a condition for passing it. What she did is not just politics; it's criminal. The D-rats forced in things that are not even remotely connected with this virus. Shame on her.
